ValidationRule.description: Certain field is required when selecting a Payment Type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.Name = "Refund Request", ISPICKVAL(Payment_Type__c,"Electronic") && or( ISBLANK(Account_Number__c), ISBLANK(Bank_Address__c), ISBLANK(Routing_Number__c), ISBLANK(Beneficiary_Name__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Beneficiary name, bank info, account #, and routing are required for electronic payment.
